content:
{"name": "Urban Recipe", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Apply today and join one of our co-ops to begin receiving frozen and non-perishable food, produce, and home goods. Complete the application online or call 404-590-2186 to apply today.

People can qualify for an Urban Recipe food co-op if you: 
1. are in need of food support for your household, 
2. have reliable access to a phone and transportation, 
3. have access to a stove top and storage for frozen and refrigerated items, and 
4. are willing to attend a one-time new member orientation and agree to member guidelines. ", "email": "", "url": "https://urbanrecipe.org/food-co-ops/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "970 Jefferson Street Northwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Bankhead", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30318", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7752905, "longitude": -84.4191541}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 688-0871", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
